data.message: Obviously we all want that eminem with the catchy flows and hooks instead of all the word play but he will forever be the best no matter what version of eminem we get

replies.message: I can listen to either I just don't like when he gets bashed for it because he's still the best

I already said this but.. Yeah I get it. Ditch the choppyness for regular rapping. Hearing his newest stuff I'd agree, but this feature on this song he switches it up enough that it just sounds great. I like, have to listen to this song twice a day. Instead of monotone chopping, he changes tone and flow and the beat compliments the shady side. Starts off with a lower voice that I've had a few friends say they didn't even know it was em. Then throughout he keeps raising pitch until the climax (like a movie) until the trump line. Whole thing gave me shivers the first handful of times.
